    • withClaimToReportingExchangeRate

      @Deprecated public B withClaimToReportingExchangeRate(ExchangeRate exchangeRate)
      Deprecated.
      You can keep using this method if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter. If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please replace all usages of this method with one of the variants that work with an ExchangeRateInUse instance. For more information, please see the product documentation.

    • withClaimToReportingExchangeRate

      @Deprecated public B withClaimToReportingExchangeRate(ValueGenerator<ExchangeRate> exchangeRateGenerator)
      Deprecated.
      You can keep using this method if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter. If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please replace all usages of this method with one of the variants that work with an ExchangeRateInUse instance. For more information, please see the product documentation.

    • onTransactionSet

      public B onTransactionSet(RITransactionSet set)

    • onTransactionSet

      public B onTransactionSet(ValueGenerator<? extends RITransactionSet> set)
      Sets the TransactionSet on this transaction, and also links the transactionset to this transaction's claim. If the transactionset does not already have a claim, its claim will be set to the transaction's claim. If multiple TransactionBuilders call onTransactionSet() on the same transactionset, only the first such call will set the claim on the transactionset (if it did not already have one).
      Parameters:
      set - the TransactionSet to link this transaction to
      Returns:
      TransactionBuilder with its TransactionSet set

    • withComments

      public B withComments(String comments)

      Returns:
      the modified builder

      Returns:
